law.catch_line: There is a Hippodrome Performing Arts Financing Fund....

text.section: There is a Hippodrome Performing Arts Financing Fund.

section.section: The Hippodrome Performing Arts Fund is a continuing, nonlapsing fund that shall be available in perpetuity to implement this subtitle concerning the Hippodrome Performing Arts facility.

The Authority shall:
use the Hippodrome Performing Arts Fund as a revolving fund for implementing this subtitle concerning the Hippodrome Performing Arts facility; and
pay any and all expenses from the Hippodrome Performing Arts Fund that are incurred by the Authority concerning the Hippodrome Performing Arts facility.

To the extent considered appropriate by the Authority, the receipts of the Hippodrome Performing Arts Fund shall be pledged to and charged with the following relating to the Hippodrome Performing Arts facility:
the payment of debt service on Authority bonds;
all reasonable charges and expenses related to Authority borrowing; and
the management of Authority obligations.
The pledge shall be effective as provided in § 10-634 of this subtitle.
The Treasurer shall invest the money of the Hippodrome Performing Arts Fund in the same manner as State funds.
Any investment earnings shall be credited to the Hippodrome Performing Arts Fund.
No part of the Hippodrome Performing Arts Fund may revert or be credited to the General Fund or any special fund of the State.
